KeyNotes.SEWERNOTES: INSTALL PVC SEWER MAIN PER MSD XXX, LENGTH, SLOPE AND SIZE AS NOTED.
INSTALL 4' I.D. MANHOLE PER MSD XXX, FRAME AND COVER PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 5' I.D. MANHOLE PER MSD XXX, FRAME AND COVER PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 6" SEWER CLEANOUT PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 4" SEWER SERVICE PER MSD XXX.
LOCATE EXISTING SEWER MAIN, CUT IN NEW 5' I.D. MANHOLE PER MSD XXX, RIM PER MSD XXX.
KeyNotes.PAVINGNOTES: INSTALL PAVING PER GEOTECHNICAL REPORT PREPARED BY OTHERS.
INSTALL 6" VERTICAL CURB PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 4" ROLL CURB PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL CURB TRANSITION PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL CURB RAMP PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL MID BLOCK CURB RAMP PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL HYDRANT MARKERS PER MSD XXX.
ADJUST MANHOLE RIM ELEVATION PER MSD XXX.
ADJUST VALVE ELEVATION PER MSD XXX.
SAWCUT AND REMOVE MIN 2' WIDTH EX. PAVEMENT PER MSD XXX.
MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
KeyNotes.GRADINGNOTES: MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
